Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: I hope all you guys debating about the currency aspect of BTC,  will help out with my radical idea for a new kind of currency.  The crux of it being setting the price-value=0 , since it is the only sustainable price that can be had, allowing 0% interest credit , thus removing the quality of “store of value “ from the money and focus entirely on being a medium of exchange .  I’m writing a more in depth piece on how it will work,  but the general gist is a bidding / burn economy.

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: I view the root problem is that money is a superior commodity which incentivizes hoarding ,  things have value based on utility, small pieces of paper or bits on a computer have little utility in themselves

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: Money also doesn’t degrade,  its price-value may fluctuate but , 1BTC = 1BTC, where real world commodities depreciate over time
